solution_line_template: The stock is worth {total_stock_value} dollars, meaning that the kittens cost {total_stock_value} - {cost_of_puppies} = <<{total_stock_value}-{cost_of_puppies}={cost_of_kittens}>>{cost_of_kittens} dollars
Since the cost of a kitten is {cost_per_kitten} dollars, the pet shop has {cost_of_kittens}/{cost_per_kitten} = <<{cost_of_kittens}/{cost_per_kitten}={num_kittens}>>{num_kittens} kittens
